page.title: 10HEALTH, PENSIONERS.
page.content: As has been previously indicated,there are approximately six hundred residents of pensionable age living within the{Parish}boundaries. The local committee of{Age Concern}is very active in looking after the welfare of those who wish to take advantage of its help.This committee runs the{"Over Sixies Club"}which meets socially once a week in the {Selwyn Hall}and currently has a regular attendance of between 40 and 50 members who get together for a chat and enjoy tea provided by one of the many organisations in the village.In the summer months regular outings are arranged and usually well supported. {Meals on wheels}are also available twice a week for those who require this service.
